title: Conspirator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Plan a conspiracy between three players during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If one of the players you planned a conspiracy about mentions the name of any of the other two players, your conspiracy will be proven. This does not trigger upon voting.
- When your conspiracy is proven, you will force the third player to choose to kill one of the other two players before the day ends. You will deal a Powerful Attack to this player at the end of the day. If they do not choose a player by the end of the day, one will be randomly selected.
- Your conspiracy only stands that day after you plan it.
- You may not plan a conspiracy about yourself you nincompoop.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have your conspiracies proven three times.
